NPC_Tikawara_Tamau_Post_Quest |guid = d8a69a38-d82c-4bab-b0e4-0da26885d5d4
d8a69a38-aa12-45c5-a290-7e488b57307c }} '''Tamau''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|The bound man casts a wary stare down at you, his arms tightening weakly beneath their restraints.}} Tamau is a member of the Roparu, the lowest caste of the Huana society, currently in a bit of a bind: He is accused of stealing food by [Mukūmu](/mukumu/) and strung up from a pole in a desperate bid to make him talk. This is no small matter for the Tikawara tribe, as it was the last of the koiki tribe, which was intended to be used in a religious ceremony to ensure a good harvest. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Plucked Fruit](/pluckedFruit/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [Plucked Fruit](/pluckedFruit/): Tamau is accused by [Pekeho](/pekeho/), but maintains that he did not actually steal the fruit. [Category:Tikawara characters](/categoryTikawaraCharacters/)

d8a69a38-aa12-45c5-a290-7e488b57307c }} '''Tamau''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== {{Description|The bound man casts a wary stare down at you, his arms tightening weakly beneath their restraints.}} Tamau is a member of the Roparu, the lowest caste of the Huana society, currently in a bit of a bind: He is accused of stealing food by [[Mukūmu]] and strung up from a pole in a desperate bid to make him talk. This is no small matter for the Tikawara tribe, as it was the last of the koiki tribe, which was intended to be used in a religious ceremony to ensure a good harvest. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[Plucked Fruit]] |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * [[Plucked Fruit]]: Tamau is accused by [[Pekeho]], but maintains that he did not actually steal the fruit.
